graph_title: Enrolled in undergraduate studies by sex
indicator_name: Enrolled in undergraduate studies by sex
title: Untitled
national_indicator_description: Enrolled student is every person enrolled at higher education institution. Higher education institutions are higher education schools and universities.The name higher education school refers to a higher education institution that realises at least one study programme from one field of study.The name university refers to a higher education institution that realises at least five different study programmes from at least three fields of study and academic levels of all three cycles. University has organizational units such as faculties, academies or scientific institutes.
